pageProduct.name: Skin Doctors Instant Facelift Wrinkle Smoothing Face Cream 30mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Skin Doctors instant facelift™ is a cosmetic facelift without the surgery that works in 5 minutes to instantly smooth wrinkles. 30ml.

Skin Doctors instant facelift™ is a cosmetic facelift without the surgery. Its a unique triple action ingredient combination for instant results that lasts for hours. It helps to:Improve the elasticity and tonicity of the skinRecommended for:A non-comedogenic formula, suitable for all skin types, including oily and sensitive skinTightens, lifts and boosts firmness

Size: 30ml

Ingredients

Key Ingredients:Liftensyl LS - a polymer derived from soy protein which displays immediate tightening properties resulting in the smoothing of fine lines and wrinkles. Skin becomes smoother, softer and more radiant.Argatensyl LS - a protein extracted from the Argania fruit found in northern Africa that has an instant tightening effect on the skin.Easyliance - a biopolymer produced by microorganisms living in plant roots that forms a matrix over the surface of the skin. While drying, it smoothes and tightens for a visible lifting effect, making the skin look smoother and younger.All Ingredients:Water (Aqua), Isopropyl Myristate, Stearic Acid, Acacia Senegal (Acacia) Gum, Glycol Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Soy Protein Phthalate, Petrolatum, Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum), Polysorbate 60, Glyceryl Stearate, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Extract, Dimethicone, PEG-100 Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Hydrolyzed Rhizobian Gum, Carbomer, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Disodium EDTA, Stearamide AMP, Glycerin, Lactic Acid, Sorbitol, Sodium Lactate, Serine, Urea, Sodium Chloride, Allantoin, Triethanolamine, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Ethylparaben, Butylparaben, Propylparaben, Fragrance (Parfum), Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool Geraniol, Citral.

Directions

Usage: Face, neck, décolletage. Process: After cleansing place a few drops on your palm and using your finger, apply to the face to form a thin layer. Once applied, look straight ahead and try not to make any facial movements such as smiling for 2-3 minutes or until cream has dried. Follow with foundation & make-up. We suggest a mineral powder to ensure longevity on firmness. Best results: For use everyday or for parties and special occasions. DO NOT apply moisturiser when using instant facelift™ as it will affect the integrity of the film.
